text: Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 22. Should any bhikkhunī engage in various types of monetary exchange, it (the income) is to be forfeited and confessed.
